description: Restores the specified backup data. This is an asynchronous operation. To know the status of this API call, use GetProtectedItemOperationResult API.

container_name.description: The container name associated with the backup items.

name.description: Resource name associated with the resource.

recovery_point_id.description: The recovery point ID for the backup data to be restored.

vault_name.description: The name of the Recovery Services vault.

fabric_name.description: The fabric name associated with the backup items.

id.description: Resource ID represents the complete path to the resource.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group associated with the Recovery Services vault.

protected_item_name.description: The backup item to be restored.

type.description: Resource type represents the complete path of the form Namespace/ResourceType/ResourceType/...
